Title: Vegetable Stir Fry
Instructions: Chop the broccoli, carrot, and bell pepper.
Heat the sesame oil in a pan.
Add the garlic and ginger and cook until fragrant.
Add the broccoli, carrot, bell pepper, and snap peas and stir fry for 5 minutes.
Mix the soy sauce, cornstarch, and water in a bowl.
Add the sauce to the pan and cook until the vegetables are tender and the sauce has thickened.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
